OK I'll do my best. :)
You won’t see me crying anytime soon because I am too busy raking in the dough.
At any given moment, I’m probably sitting in my mansion
while you're stuck munching on peels and living in constant frustration.

I run the world—and I don’t mean that I’m in some Illuminati.

I’m sure you're pretty tasty, but I'm Bill freaking Gates!
If I was a fruit, you know I’d be an exotic one that's expensive on each plate.

I'm the king of technology and the leader of my class.
You're just a yellow fruit that people enjoy with brunch.

So step aside banana, because I am the man.

sampled.completion1:
Elon Musk versus banana in an Epic Rap Battle. Who will win? Only one way to find out!
Musk: Now this is one Epic Rap Battle
To let the world know I am the best
But I'm not up there with myself, I am better than that

I can peel you real fast and then I can split you apart
There's no way that you can outdo a heart
Musk: You're just one banana, what do you have?
I have solar panels to power the whole cave
I have the Tesla cars that are really awesome
And I have the SpaceX too that flies to Mars

Banana: You can keep your spaceship because I have the power

This is just a fun game, and you know I love you anyway

prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are apple, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (apple) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
Coming up!

[Verse]
I'm Jeff Bezos, CEO of Amazon.
I'm building an empire and I'm not even done yet!
Amazon grew its revenue by 20% last year.
But not nearly all the profit that we earned.
When Bezos bought the Washington Post, I know you were like: why?
But I don't have as much money as you think. That's right!
The Washington Post was not my first purchase at all,
I created and have been the CEO of an online store called Amazon!
And I don't just buy and sell stocks, I make inventions too.
If you're wondering what I'm talking about, I'll tell you.
I made Fire TV and Alexa, my very own digital assistant.
And my new hobby? Space exploration, not fashion or music.
I've been the richest man in the world for a pretty long time.
I own a company that's bigger than Walmart and it's doing just fine.
And if you think I'm a jerk and don't deserve what I've earned in life,
Apple's CEO, Tim Cook, once called me the greatest investor of all time.
Amazon is the biggest company of its kind,
And the second richest man on earth is my wife, but that's my business, not yours.
My competition might be trying to make me go astray,
But all my focus is on making sure I'm leading Amazon in the right direction each day.
I'm no amateur in the ring for this Epic Rap Battle.
But you know my opponent; you might know what I'm saying.
Apple is not living up to your name.
You're like a kid in the playground, but the other kids are all afraid of you.
My competitor thinks that it can do everything

Bezos:

Boy, I’m Jeff Bezos the Amazon man,

Jeff Bezos, you can never be my equal,

Amazon, it’s a marketplace,

Apple, it’s just overpriced garbage.

I beat you in the marketplace,

I got all the money, I'm rich AF.

Your company is all but a joke,

your brand is just an overhyped iPhone.

I’m a powerful CEO,

your company’s already overthrown,

and with Amazon in your face,

you ain’t nothing but a small time player.
